By
Darren MacDonald
Published:
January 23, 2025 at 3:28PM EST
The Ramsey Lake Skating Path opens for the season Jan. 24, Greater Sudbury announced Thursday.

author: OsielGonz√°lez Hern√°ndez
title: Inauguran Centro de Atenci√≥n Integral a Personas con Discapacidad de DIF Guadalajara | El Informador
text: Esta ma√±ana inauguraron el Centro de Atenci√≥n Integral a Personas con Discapacidad (CAIPED) en el Centro de Desarrollo Comunitario n√∫mero 25 del DIF Guadalajara, ubicado en avenida Patria al cruce con Islas Malvinas, en la colonia Villa Guerrero.El evento fue presidido por Eduardo Solorio, coordinador de inclusi√≥n del sistema DIF Guadalajara; Diana Malacara, coordinadora del voluntariado del sistema DIF Guadalajara; Diana Vargas, directora general del sistema DIF Guadalajara; Maye Villa, presidenta del sistema DIF Guadalajara; Juan Francisco Ram√≠rez, Presidente municipal interino de Guadalajara; Pablo Lemus, gobernador electo de Jalisco, y autoridades del Ayuntamiento Tapat√≠o.‚ÄúEn un entorno donde la movilidad es crucial para acceder a oportunidades educativas, laborales y sociales, la rehabilitaci√≥n se convierte en un recurso indispensable que debe proveer los gobiernos para promover la autonom√≠a y la inclusi√≥n de todas las personas. Por eso, este Centro ofrece programas dise√±ados para adaptarse a las necesidades espec√≠ficas de cada paciente, independientemente de su condici√≥n econ√≥mica o social‚Äù, dijo la presidenta del sistema DIF Guadalajara.Francisco Ontiveros, director de Obras P√∫blicas de Guadalajara, explic√≥ que se intervino un √°rea de cerca de mil 300 metros cuadrados, la cual fue remodelada y habilitada como un Centro de Atenci√≥n a personas discapacidad, pues antes fung√≠a como una guarder√≠a. Se cambi√≥ el piso del inmueble y se instalaron nuevas luminarias en el recinto.‚ÄúEs un espacio que refleja nuestra firme convicci√≥n de construir una Guadalajara m√°s inclusiva, humana y justa. Y, por supuesto, que esto marca totalmente la diferencia para aquellas familias que todav√≠a, cargando con un plus, con un extra, hay rachas econ√≥micas con las que no se puede avanzar; esto (el Centro) es como un alivio y es solidaridad por parte del gobierno‚Äù, agreg√≥ el Presidente municipal interino de Guadalajara.Por su parte, Pablo Lemus record√≥ que durante sus administraciones al frente de los Ayuntamientos de Zapopan y Guadalajara ha llevado a cabo obras sociales en distintas zonas de estos municipios en los que no se contaban con estos servicios. ‚ÄúLe apostamos a tener no solamente una ciudad, sino un estado mucho m√°s igualitario, que considere absolutamente a todas las personas en un trato extraordinariamente digno‚Äù, concluy√≥.En tanto, en punto de las 11:00 horas se realiz√≥ el simulacro en conmemoraci√≥n por el aniversario del sismo ocurrido el 19 de septiembre de 1985 y de 2021 en la Ciudad de M√©xico. Aquel se llev√≥ a cabo sin contratiempos y con saldo blanco.FS

author: Tunde Oyekola
title: Gunmen kill Kwara monarch, abduct wife, two others
text:
Gunmen, on Thursday evening, invaded Koro town in Ekiti Local Government Area of Kwara State, killing the traditional ruler, Oba Segun Aremu-Cole.
It was gathered that the gunmen stormed the palace of the monarch around 7 pm, fired gunshots which hit the traditional ruler.
The wife of the monarch was also abducted by the assailants.
Koro Ekiti shares boundary with Egbe, in Yagba West Local Government Area of Kogi State.
This is coming a few days after gunmen killed two traditional rulers in Ekiti State.
The duo ‚Äì Onimojo of Imojo Ekiti in Oye Local Government Area and Elesun of Esun Ekiti in Ajoni, Ikole Local Government Area of Ekiti State, were attacked by the gunmen while returning from a meeting.
Meanwhile, the state Governor AbdulRahman AbdulRazaq who confirmed the attack late Thursday in a statement by his Chief Press Secretary, Rafiu Ajakaye, condemned the killing of the monarch.
The statement read, ‚ÄúThe monarch was reportedly shot dead in his palace on Thursday night by some unknown gunmen, who also whisked away his wife and two others.
‚ÄúThe governor condemned the development, which he said was reckless, shocking, and abominable.
‚ÄúHe charged the security agencies not to spare any resources to track down the perpetrators, free the spouse and others taken away, and bring them to book.‚Äù
Ajakaiye further quoted the governor as saying, ‚ÄúWe will certainly get the perpetrators and ensure that this is their last crime against humanity.
‚ÄúMy profound condolences go to the people of Koro. Our hearts are broken, and we stand by them at this time and always‚Äù, the statement said.
However, the Kwara state Police Commissioner, Victor Olaiya, was yet to respond to inquiry on the incident as of the time of filing this report.

author: Fox News
title: Pentagon says there is a ‚Äòdeepening cooperation and relationship‚Äô between Russia and Iran
text:
A partnership between Russia and Iran is allegedly deepening, according to the Pentagon.
In a press conference on Thursday, Deputy Pentagon press secretary Sabrina Singh responded to a journalist‚Äôs question regarding a recent meeting between leaders of the two nations.
PENTAGON SAYS AN ATTACK BY IRAN IS ‚ÄòCERTAINLY POSSIBLE‚Äô THIS WEEK: ‚ÄòWE NEED TO TAKE IT SERIOUSLY‚Äô
‚ÄúSo I can‚Äôt speculate on, you know, on that visit, I would say that I think, separately, we‚Äôve seen a deepening cooperation and relationship between Russia and Iran as Russia continues to, engage in its unlawful war in Ukraine ,‚Äù said Singh.
‚ÄúSo, you know, we‚Äôve we‚Äôve seen that deepening partnership.‚Äù
‚ÄúWe‚Äôve seen Russia continue to seek weapons out from Iran. While I can speculate on what this visit entails, you know, we‚Äôve seen these visits of leaders, happen over the course of the last two years,‚Äù Singh added.
U.S. MILITARY EXPANDS PRESENCE IN MIDDLE EAST, REPOSITIONS FORCES AS REGIONAL TENSIONS SIMMER
Russia has recently promised missile support to Iran after a visit by a defense minister to the Middle Eastern nation.
Singh clarified, ‚Äúin terms of how this plays, you know, into the Middle East. Look, Iran has a choice. I think we‚Äôve been very clear in our messaging when it comes to the defense of Israel . We are going to stand in the defense of Israel just as we did, you know, on April 13th.‚Äù
The United States has recently expanded its presence in the Middle East , sending the USS Abraham Lincoln Carrier Strike Group to the region.
According to the Pentagon, it is unclear exactly where these additional American defense resources will be located.
CLICK HERE TO GET THE FOX NEWS APP
The Pentagon did not immediately respond to Fox News Digital‚Äôs request for comment.
The post Pentagon says there is a ‚Äòdeepening cooperation and relationship‚Äô between Russia and Iran appeared first on Fox News .

author: Norberto De la Mata
title: Germ√°n N√≥voa destaca el "alt√≠simo nivel" de la Ponferradina: "Tenemos muy buenos delanteros"
text:
El central gallego cree que ¬´hicimos muchas cosas bien¬ª contra el Andorra
El jugador de la Deportiva Ponferradina Germ√°n N√≥voa atendi√≥ a la previa del partido ante el Arenteiro, que fue su equipo hasta el final de la pasada campa√±a. Al respecto, explic√≥ que ¬´a√∫n tengo contacto con compa√±eros. Son muchos a√±os all√≠¬ª, record√≥ el defensa gallego, que a√±adi√≥ que est√° ¬´deseando que llegue el partido. Es un club al que le tengo mucho cari√±o¬ª, asever√≥ el defensa blanquiazul, que brome√≥ sobre la posibilidad de hacer gol a los de Carballi√±o. ¬´No le meto ni al arco√≠ris¬ª, dijo.
En este sentido, coment√≥ que espera ¬´un Arenteiro jodido¬ª por el entrenador, Ra√∫l Jardiel, que, record√≥, ¬´la segunda vuelta que hizo en el Teruel fue incre√≠ble. Intentar presionar y a por ellos¬ª, fueron los argumentos que expuso N√≥voa, que asegur√≥ que ¬´venimos de Andorra con muy buenas sensaciones pese al empate. Es un campo dif√≠cil y se ver√° a la larga¬ª, consider√≥ el zaguero, que a√±adi√≥ que ¬´hicimos muchas cosas bien. Salimos muy convencidos¬ª, apostill√≥ el defensa, que aclar√≥ que ¬´salimos siempre a ganar. Viendo la primera parte, es una sensaci√≥n dif√≠cil¬ª, reconoci√≥ el defensa, que agreg√≥ ¬´un empate en el campo del Andorra no es mal resultado¬ª.
De cara al futuro, dijo N√≥voa que espera ir mejorando: Si somos f√©rreos y mantenemos la puerta a cero, vamos a ganar muchos partidos. Poco a poco vamos puliendo detalles¬ª, precis√≥ el gallego, que explic√≥ que ¬´somos fuertes de mente. En el f√∫tbol todo es empezar desde la defensa¬ª, coment√≥ el zaguero ourensano, que alab√≥ el trabajo del colectivo: ¬´Nadie es imprescindible. Somos jugadores que estamos preparados para salir en cualquier momento¬ª, precis√≥ N√≥voa, que a√±adi√≥ que ¬´somos una plantilla de nivel alt√≠simo. Tenemos muy buenos delanteros¬ª, opin√≥ el gallego, que apunt√≥ que ¬´no s√≥lo los delanteros pueden hacer goles¬ª.
Por otro lado, habl√≥ sobre Yuri, que fue homenajeado el mi√©rcoles, y dijo que ¬´es una leyenda Delanteros as√≠ quedan pocos¬ª, consider√≥ el defensa, que envi√≥ ¬´mucho √°nimo¬ª a Nacho Ram√≥n, del Arenteiro, y Sol√≠s, del Andorra, lesionados de gravedad. ¬´Que se recuperen lo antes posible¬ª, dese√≥ el gallego, que asegur√≥ que no encuentra raz√≥n a esa plaga de lesiones. ¬´Quiz√° esa inestabilidad tras el Covid¬ª, puntualiz√≥.

author: Crisis24
title: China: Heatwave likely to persist in northwestern and southeastern regions through at least Aug. 12 | Crisis24
text: Heatwave likely to persist in parts of northwestern and southeastern China through at least Aug. 12. Utility disruptions possible. High temperatures will likely persist across parts of northwestern and southeastern China through at least Aug. 12. As of early Aug. 2, the China Meteorological Administration has issued a yellow high-temperature warning (the second lowest level on a four-tier scale) across the affected areas. Temperatures of over 40 C (104 F) are possible in parts of southern Anhui, western Chongqing, central and northern Fujian, southeastern Hubei, southern Jiangsu, northeastern Jiangxi, Shanghai, southeastern Sichuan, Xinjiang, and Zhejiang. High temperatures of 35-39 C (95-102 F) are forecast across the affected areas through at least Aug. 12. Officials could upgrade, rescind, or expand the coverage of weather alerts over the coming days. The extended period of oppressive heat and dry conditions may produce ideal circumstances for wildfire growth throughout the region. Heatwaves also threaten vulnerable groups - such as the elderly, children, pregnant women, and those with respiratory illnesses - due to the increased possibility of heat stroke or heat exhaustion during prolonged exposure to high temperatures. These health risks could also extend to relatively healthy individuals during significant heatwave events. In addition to significantly impacting athletes and those who work outdoors, high temperatures can cause problems for people using mass transit. The lack of air conditioning and cramped vehicles during rush hour may lead to some passengers' hospitalization. Very high temperatures may damage road surfaces, and overheated vehicles may worsen traffic problems in urban areas where congestion is already a problem. Commercial trucking disruptions might occur, as very high temperatures put more stress on vehicles, making tire blowouts more common. Major flight disruptions are unlikely at regional airports, but general aviation disruptions are possible, and some airfreight carriers could reduce cargo loads. High temperatures could lead to an increased demand for electricity, which might trigger localized brownouts or blackouts, exacerbating hazardous conditions when air conditioning is no longer possible. Monitor local media for weather updates and related advisories. During heatwaves, remain indoors in air conditioning when possible. If outdoor activities are necessary, frequently rest in shaded areas; avoid activity during the hottest times of the day. Stay well-hydrated by drinking plenty of fluids. Avoid alcoholic beverages, which are dehydrating; drink bottled or boiled water. Wear loose-fitting, light-colored clothing. Cotton fabrics are more cooling than synthetics. Promptly seek medical attention if signs of heat exhaustion or heat stroke develop. Charge battery-powered devices in the case of prolonged electricity outages.

Twitter Facebook Youtube Instagram Ao vivo Login Cadastre-se Esporte na Band Esporte "Corinthians √© muito grande para ter tanta ajuda", dispara goleiro do Gr√™mio Marches√≠n ficou na bronca com a arbitragem do jogo contra o Tim√£o Da reda√ß√£o
25/07/2024 ‚Ä¢ 21:22 ‚Ä¢ Atualizado em 25/07/2024 ‚Ä¢ 22:38
Lucas Uebel / Gr√™mio FBPA O goleiro argentino Marches√≠n, do Gr√™mio , disparou contra a arbitragem no intervalo da partida contra o Corinthians , pelo Campeonato Brasileiro, nesta quinta-feira (25). No fim, as equipes empataram por 2 a 2 na Neo Qu√≠mica Arena .
O jogador reclamou bastante da arbitragem de Alex Gomes Stefano, que deu um p√™nalti para o Tim√£o ap√≥s revis√£o no VAR. Ele soltou at√© um palavr√£o.
‚ÄúVoc√™ est√° vendo? Isso √© uma vergonha, o que est√° acontecendo hoje aqui √© uma vergonha. N√£o importa se serei expulso, punido. Vir jogar num campo aqui, com tudo o que est√° acontecendo no Rio Grande do Sul... estamos sofrendo para car*, longe da fam√≠lia. Como dar esse p√™nalti [para o Corinthians]? √â uma vergonha, sinceramente. Gr√™mio √© muito grande para estar sofrendo isso. Corinthians √© muito grande, respeitamos eles, mas √© uma verdadeira vergonha. O Corinthians √© muito grande para ter tanta ajuda‚Äù, disparou Marches√≠n ao ‚ÄòPremiere‚Äô.
Al√©m do p√™nalti de Kannemann em Romero, anotado ap√≥s ida ao VAR do √°rbitro Alex Gomes Stefano, o goleiro do Gr√™mio ainda saiu na bronca por causa de um gol anulado do Tricolor (impedimento), uma poss√≠vel m√£o de Andr√© Ramalho dentro da √°rea e um pis√£o de Yuri Alberto no arqueiro argentino.
